key_changes: Initialized locale variable using useLocale() hook
Replaced 4 hardcoded 'en-US' locale strings with dynamic locale variable
Applied locale to toLocaleDateString(), toLocaleTimeString(), and toLocaleString() calls

patterns_discovered.description: Replacing hardcoded locale strings with a custom hook (useLocale) enables centralized locale management
patterns_discovered.benefit: Reduces duplication and enables dynamic locale switching across the application

patterns_discovered.description: Using React hooks to manage application-wide configuration like locale
patterns_discovered.benefit: Provides clean, reusable interface for locale access throughout components

gotchas_discovered.description: The component had 4 separate calls to date formatting methods spread across different UI sections
gotchas_discovered.impact: Localization changes required updates in multiple places within the same file
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Using centralized locale hook prevents this from being an issue in the future

gotchas_discovered.description: Component used three different date formatting methods (toLocaleDateString, toLocaleTimeString, toLocaleString)
gotchas_discovered.impact: Increases surface area for localization bugs if not consistently updated
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: All methods correctly updated in this implementation

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully replaced all hardcoded 'en-US' locale strings in DashboardPage.tsx with dynamic locale from useLocale hook
implementation_strategy: Called useLocale() in component to get current locale
Systematically replaced 4 hardcoded locale strings with locale variable

recommendations.recommendation: Audit entire codebase for remaining hardcoded locales
recommendations.reasoning: This subtask focused on one file; similar issues likely exist in other components

recommendations.recommendation: Create a linting rule to prevent hardcoded locale strings
recommendations.reasoning: Prevents regression of hardcoded 'en-US' strings in future development
Ensures consistent implementation across all date/time formatting in the codebase

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting date formatting logic into utility functions
recommendations.reasoning: Would reduce duplication of formatting options across date/time display calls
